hawarden-contest

A Souvenir of the Opera
Hawarden Park, Hawarden, Flintshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £20 and shield, 2nd £10, 3rd £7, 4th £5, 5th £3. March contest(own choice) - 1st(£2) Penketh Tannery, 2nd(£1) Connah's Quay, 3rd(10s.) Summer's Steel Works. Promoted by Shepherds and Druids Friendly Society. 5 bands competed.
Oct. 4, 2013, 9:34 a.m. Aug. 17, 2016, 8:57 a.m.
1 Connah's Quay Silver William Halliwell
2 Summers' Steel Works Herbert Parry
3 Penketh Tannery J. A. Greenwood
